SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssignationResponse
DTO representing a list of the processed Orders with their corresponding assigned logistics Center.
Center
Represents a logistics center in the system.
CenterManagementController
REST Controller for managing logistics centers.
CenterManagementService
Service class responsible for managing logistics centers.
CenterRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Center entities.
CenterRequest
DTO representing a Center.
Coordinates
Represents the coordinates of an order or logistics center.
HealthCheckController
REST Controller for checking if the container is working properly.
InditexApplication
Entry point for the Inditex Spring Boot application.
Order
Represents an order in the system.
OrderAssignation
DTO representing an Order Assignation.
OrderManagementController
REST Controller for managing Orders.
OrderManagementService
Service class responsible for managing orders.
OrderRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Order entities.
OrderRequest
DTO representing an Order Request This is the payload for the order creation POST endpoint.
OrderResponse
DTO representing an Order Response.
